plugins.name: leaflet-providers
plugins.description: An extension to Leaflet that contains configurations for various free1 tile providers.

plugins.name: leaflet-multi-markers
plugins.description: A Leaflet plugin for displaying a large number of highly customizable markers, such as those from a CSV file read using Papa Parse. It can easily handle both overall and individual settings for icons, markers, and popups.

plugins.name: wicket
plugins.description: Wicket is a lightweight library for translating between Well-Known Text (WKT) and various client-side mapping frameworks

plugins.name: leaflet-indoor
plugins.description: Provides basic tools to create indoor maps with Leaflet.

plugins.name: leaflet-realtime
plugins.description: Put realtime data on a Leaflet map: live tracking GPS units, sensor data or just about anything.

plugins.name: leaflet-timezones
plugins.description: Overlay timezones on a Leaflet Earth map.

plugins.name: leaflet-environmental-layers
plugins.description: A leaflet plugin that has a collection of layers containing environmental data pulled in from different sources.

plugins.name: leaflet-markercluster
plugins.description: Provides Beautiful Animated Marker Clustering functionality for Leaflet, a JS library for interactive maps.

plugins.name: leaflet-editable-polyline
plugins.description: Most editable polylines have performance problems on bigger polylines because of too many markers shown on the map.

plugins.name: leaflet-panel-layers
plugins.description: Leaflet Control Layers extended with support groups and icons

plugins.name: leaflet-polylinemeasure
plugins.description: Leaflet Plugin to measure distances of simple lines as well as of complex polylines.

plugins.name: leaflet-gesturehandling
plugins.description: Brings the basic functionality of Google Maps Gesture Handling into Leaflet.

plugins.name: leaflet-locatecontrol
plugins.description: A useful control to geolocate the user with many options. Official Leaflet and MapBox plugin.
